scripts.build: wp-scripts build plugins/uv-core/blocks/activities/index.js --output-path=plugins/uv-core/blocks/activities/build && wp-scripts build plugins/uv-core/blocks/experiences/index.js --output-path=plugins/uv-core/blocks/experiences/build && wp-scripts build plugins/uv-core/blocks/locations-grid/index.js --output-path=plugins/uv-core/blocks/locations-grid/build && wp-scripts build plugins/uv-core/blocks/news/index.js --output-path=plugins/uv-core/blocks/news/build && wp-scripts build plugins/uv-core/blocks/partners/index.js --output-path=plugins/uv-core/blocks/partners/build
